snippet.title: Zelda XD2 Mercuris Chess Trailer [en]
snippet.description:
Zelda XD2: Mercuris Chess is the sequel of our first XD parodic game, and was also released on April 1st, in 2017 this time. As a direct sequel, the overworld is expanded, the story is extended and the funny tone is kept, if not improved!

While Link is trying to make up for his past faults with Princess Zelda, a very rich businessman named Mr Grump took over the kingdom and bought everything...

The Solarus game engine is free software, licensed under GPL v3.
This game was created by fans, is non commercial and is not related to Nintendo.
Assets that are not copyrighted are licensed under Creative Commons CC BY-SA 4.0.

Trailer made by Olivier Cléro.

Download now: http://www.solarus-games.org/games/zelda-xd2-mercuris-chess/
